title.rendered: “Remembering IDF Heroes: Updated Casualty and Injury Report from Recent Gaza Strip Battles”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesperson regarding the names of five IDF casualties whose notifications have been delivered to their families: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC09122023MNFIOERHFFD

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where their details and pictures are published and updated: https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, a soldier from battalion 53, “Barak” formation (188), was severely injured yesterday (Friday) in a battle in the north of the Gaza Strip. An officer and two IDF soldiers from the 603 Engineering Battalion, “Saar Megolan” formation (7), were severely injured yesterday (Friday) in a battle in the south of the Gaza Strip.

Also, an officer and a platoon sergeant from Geffen Battalion, 1st Armoured Brigade, were severely injured yesterday (Friday) in a battle in the north of the Gaza Strip.

Two IDF reserve soldiers were severely injured yesterday (Friday) as a result of fire towards an IDF position in Lebanon.

In addition, a soldier from the Givati reconnaissance battalion was severely injured today (Saturday) in a battle in the north of the Gaza Strip. A reserve officer from the 6017 Medical Corps unit was severely injured today in the Gaza Strip.

Also, a reserve soldier from battalion 93, Kfir brigade, was severely injured today (Saturday) in a battle in the north of the Gaza Strip as were a section commander and an armoured fighting vehicle operator from battalion 93, Kfir brigade, in the north of the Gaza Strip.

Two reserve soldiers from the 79th Battalion, 14th Brigade, were severely injured today (Saturday) in a battle in the center of the Gaza Strip.

The wounded were taken to the hospital for medical treatment, their families were updated.
